faq.title: We clear up the doubts that hold back your decision
faq.description: We answer the most common questions so you can make the best decision for your organization.

items.question: How do we protect data privacy?
items.answer: We work with public, aggregated and/or anonymized data. We comply with Law 25.326 and never process personally identifiable information without consent. We have access controls, encryption in transit and audit logs.

items.question: How long does implementation take?
items.answer: Between 2 and 4 weeks depending on scope. Includes survey, configuration, model training and short training sessions for your team.

items.question: Does it integrate with our current systems?
items.answer: Yes. We integrate via API/Webhooks with CRMs, ERPs, contact centers, forms and channels (web/WhatsApp/email). If you need a specific connector, we evaluate it in the kickoff.

items.question: What results can I expect?
items.answer: It depends on the case, but our clients typically achieve: -70% of repetitive phone inquiries, +40% in qualified conversions, and 24/7 availability in service. We share expected metrics in the demo according to your sector.

items.question: What does support include?
items.answer: 24/7 technical support, monitoring, continuous improvements and a customer success assigned during the first 3 months (at no cost). Then, support plans according to usage.

items.question: How is AI trained with our context?
items.answer: We upload guides, FAQs, documents and flows. AI learns patterns (doesn't memorize sensitive data) and updates seamlessly when processes or policies change.

items.question: Where is data hosted?
items.answer: Secure cloud with encryption and backups. If your policy requires it, we evaluate on-premise options or specific regions.

items.question: Are there hidden costs?
items.answer: No. The budget includes implementation, training, initial support and agreed functionalities. Any extra is quoted in writing before proceeding.

items.question: What if my team is not technical?
items.answer: It's not necessary. We do end-to-end configuration and leave simple dashboards for your team to see metrics and make basic adjustments.

items.question: Can we do a pilot test?
items.answer: Yes. We offer limited pilots with clear objectives and measurable success criteria. We define it in a call and move forward quickly.
